name: The Hound of Tindalos
text: Continuous: This card gains [+200/+200] for each card named "The Hound of Tindalos" in your graveyard. Continuous: When this card is put into a graveyard from your field, you may pay . If you do, search your main deck for a card named "The Hound of Tindalos" and put it into your field rested. Then shuffle your main deck.
